originalText.text:
I love this food for my cavalier and he’s obsessed.
Since I’ve had him he’s had a really sensibel digestion and always problems.
With the turkey snd macaroni receipt he’s better then ever.

And the store itself is amazing too, all you can wish for you will find and the stuff was really friendly and helpful.

originalText.text:
I have been waiting for something like this for a long time. I love my dogs as if they are my children and want the best for them in every way possible. I have always wanted to cook for them because I've read online the weird things that bagged dog food has, i.e.-wood chips (for fiber) and feathers (for calcium) etc.

I have asked my vet if I can cook for my dogs, but the answer was always that its best to just buy it because dogs need special nutrients which they don't get from cooked food that we make at home.

Finally there is an amazing company who makes delicious food for our fur babies! They use human grade ingredients so basically you can also eat the same food and it would be totally okay. The use very little ingredients which are all labeled on the front of the packages and have no preservatives whatsoever.

One of my dogs has a renal issue and I was so happy to see that JustFoodForDogs has some prescription dog food as well!

They make the food fresh daily and offer free shipping for order of $50 or more. I have never seen my dog so happy with eating his food. I feel sad that the company wasn't around earlier. I will only feed my fur babies this food going forward. I really believe its going to add years to their life.

Thank you JustFoodForDogs for your amazing contribution to our fur babies!!

IG-@traveleen_gurl

originalText.text: Our little ladies were both in surgery for some fairly extensive dental work, and we decided to venture to the JFFD location to see if it could be the right fit for softer meals over next couple of weeks.  Brianna came to help us and was soooo knowledgeable and helpful as to what they do and what might work best for us, including a blander mix to try if tummies were upset post surgery and during medication use.  Judging by the tail wags and vocals of each feeding, we def have fans now!  But I was really impressed with Brianna and the full team taking time to really answer questions, and just being so warm and welcoming!  There are so many options for great food for your fur babies out there, but the staff won our loyalty.  Thank you guys, and great recommendations!

originalText.text: I love this place and so does my Dog. I order every 2 weeks and keep my card on file and I’ve been a customer for about 2 years. I’m a huge fan of Alex! She’s super professional, knows me and my dog and already knows what I like. For the most part the team here is on point! I can’t speak for management because I’ve never met them and have  never had a reason to which I guess is a good thing. The team takes care of me and things don’t go wrong with my orders.

originalText.text: Good product. Unfortunately the delivery service they use is horrible.  Until they drop whoever they are using, I suggest store pickup
